hero.title: Build Smarter. Live Better
hero.subtitle: We've decoded the construction process. By moving production off-site and into the lab, Fast Struct delivers precision-engineered homes without the chaos of traditional building

twoPaths.title: Two Paths. One Standard of Excellence
twoPaths.subtitle: We don't force you into a box. We choose the construction method that fits your site, your design, and your timeline

modular.title: The Modular Route
modular.description: Ideal for rapid deployment. We manufacture fully finished 3D volumes—including structure, electricity, and finishes—in our factory. They arrive on your site ready to connect

panelized.title: The Panelized Route
panelized.description: Ideal for design freedom. We manufacture precision-engineered 'Smart Walls' that pack flat and assemble rapidly on-site. This allows for wider spaces and access to difficult lots

nineCoreSystem.title: The 9-Core System: Infinite Possibilities
nineCoreSystem.subtitle: Innovation lies in simplicity. Fastruct has engineered 9 proprietary smart-panel types. These serve as the 'LEGO blocks' of our architecture

scalableSolutions.title: Scalable Solutions for Every Need
scalableSolutions.subtitle: From a single backyard unit to a full-scale development, our technology adapts to your vision

solutions.subtitle: Speed & Minimal Disruption
solutions.title: Instant Space
solutions.description: Add a premium living space to your property without the headache of a long construction site. Our modular ADUs arrive 95% complete and are craned into place in a single day—keeping your backyard clean, quiet, and instantly usable

solutions.subtitle: Architectural Freedom & Performance
solutions.title: Uncompromised Living
solutions.description: We bridge the gap between custom architecture and industrial precision. By using our Hybrid System (Panels + Modules), you get the design freedom of a traditional architect with the speed and superior insulation of factory manufacturing

solutions.subtitle: Faster ROI & Consistent Quality
solutions.title: Precision at Scale
solutions.description: For developers, time is ROI. Fast Struct streamlines the path from permit to occupancy. As a licensed contractor with complete A-Z solutions, we replicate high-quality units with millimeter accuracy, significantly shortening project timelines and reducing on-site management overhead

customization.title: You Are the Architect of Your Experience
customization.subtitle: You aren't buying a fixed product; you are partnering with us to shape your home
